title: Acceptable Lies: The Criminal Within
description: A psychological thriller, Acceptable Lies follows rookie detective Jamie Harris on the trail of a pathological killer, ultimately to see if he has what it takes to confront evil in its most insidious form. Action-packed, this story leaves the mind spinning long after finishing the book. Check out the official webpage and discover more of the best full-length crime novels from Joel Cutter at www.joelcutter.com.
author: Joel Cutter
